description: DaemonSet represents the configuration of a daemon set.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

spec.description: The desired behavior of this daemon set.

status.description: The current status of this daemon set. This data may be out of date by some window of time. Populated by the system. Read-only.
